thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 09 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Henan Hengxing Science & Technology To Set Up Project Company For Smartphone Lens Business

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Henan Hengxing Science & Technology To Set Up Project Company For Smartphone Lens Business

organizations.name: hengxing science & technology to set up project company for smartphone lens business april
henan hengxing science & technology co ltd

text:
April 9 (Reuters) - Henan Hengxing Science & Technology Co Ltd:
* SAYS IT AND UNIT SIGN FRAMEWORK AGREEMENT TO SET UP PROJECT COMPANY FOR SMARTPHONE LENS OR RELATED BUSINESS WITH INVESTMENT OF ABOUT 400 MILLION YUAN ($63.36 million)
* IT AIMS TO LIST THE PROJECT COMPANY IN HONG KONG STOCK EXCHANGE AS ITS FIRST PRIORITY Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2JwVFk3 Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3135 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
